metadata.description: Custom Claude Code plugins by abossenbroek

plugins.name: red-agent
plugins.description: Adversarial red/rainbow team analysis plugin for Claude Code. Finds weaknesses in LLM interactions through systematic probing using a 10x10 attack taxonomy (11 categories for PR analysis including code-duplication). Includes automated fix orchestrator with GitHub integration, PR analysis with 4 git modes, and comprehensive security documentation.

plugins.name: context-engineering
plugins.description: Production-grade context engineering tool for expert LLM engineers. Analyzes and improves Claude Code plugins using SOTA orchestration patterns - Four Laws, tiered fidelity, severity batching, and firewall architectures.
